exit_steps.title: Uitschrijven (Deregistration)
exit_steps.outcome: Removal from the BRP (Personal Records Database)
exit_steps.notes: Your municipality will automatically inform other government agencies of your move.

exit_steps.title: Health Insurance Cancellation
requirements: Proof of deregistration or proof of new insurance in Poland
exit_steps.notes: Do not cancel until you have your new insurance or deregistration ready.
